Kup/Talon:

"Going to help"said Kup to lord Elder"If something happens me, =
send Elita to Lord Perseus's base, she will be safe there" the old autobot =
ran towards the exit.

***********************

Talon was ready to protest =
 but she shut up and run towards the chambers where Lord Perseus was.



Fr=
om: Sandy 
Sent: Wednesday, April 07, 2010 10:22 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come back


  
Just as Lor=
d Elder, and Kup thought that Night Shift's communication abilities were bl=
acked out, Night Shift uses his internal cerebral com link which he had as =
a backup unit, in case his external transmitter was broken, and gets throug=
h to Lord Elder on a Maximal channel. Yet, this one could only transmit tex=
t messages on the computer. This time he sends to both Lord Elder, Kup and =
Lord Perseus at the Maximal base.

" SOS guys, cover's blown. Hydras is gon=
na attempt ta torture me, I'll do what I can ta raise a stink on my end, bu=
t I dunno how much time that's gonna buy me. Yeah, I need ta be bailed out.=
 Bit off more than I could chew, over. Gotta split. And maybe literally.. N=
ight Shift out. PS: Sendn' distress beacon now."

This message now reaches =
Tucson Prime who gasps.

Tucson looks to Depthcharge. He had to change his =
plans.. Pronto.

" Depthcharge, I hate to do this to you but I have a chang=
e in agenda. I just got an emergency distress beacon from Night Shift, he's=
 in trouble, and it looks like he needs my help! Talon, Nightshift needs me=
, I'm sorry, but I have to again. I love you too much to lose you to Hydras=
 and the others. Stay safe with Lord Perseus, I'll be back here as soon as =
I get Night Shift out of danger. As soon as I get him out of there, I'll be=
 back to talk to Nightstrike. I promise, this isn't forever."

He gives Tal=
on a kiss on her cheek and holds her hand briefly before moving away, and q=
uickly transforming to missile truck mode. He's quick to drive out of the b=
ase, and outside, where he's met by Quickstride.

"Hey, what's the rush sir=
?!"

Tucson stops briefly.

"Rescue mission, I'm sorry but I'm in a bit of =
a hurry."

Quickstride transforms into his robot mode.

"Heeey, you almost =
got inta trouble that first time, at least take some backup with ya!"

Rat =
Trap also joins him.

"Ditto! Ya aint' don' this alone!"

Tucson opens his =
cab, to both Maximals, as they get in.

" I suppose there's not talking you=
 two out of this. All right, it could get dangerous though."

Rat Trap grin=
s.

"Yeah, goes with the job I suppose. Rat Trap ta Lord Elder, over, we go=
t Nightshifts' distress beacon and we got Tucson Prime with us, get ready f=
or a real fireworks display because the big bot's really cheesed off this t=
ime."

Tucson accelerates to over a hundred miles per hour, getting further=
 away from the Maximal Base.
He activates his distress signal on his intern=
al com link. 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonu=
s@...> wrote:
>
> Who: LORD ELDER, Kup, Elita
> Location: The Ark's command=
 center
> 
> > "Maybe the situation isnt so serious as it looks"said doutbl=
y Kup
> 
> Lord Elder nodded as he received further word from Tuscon, "You =
may be right."
> 
> Elder looked at his screen in front of him, "But two th=
ings still bug
> me." he said as he manipulated the controls in front of hi=
m, "That
> sensor ghost has been with us for quite some time. We cannot kno=
w what
> it is seen. If it is Predacon or Minion it could be a spy." Elder
=
> frowned, "and if it is, we don't know what it has seen, and what it
> has=
 communicated to its masters."
> 
> Elder started to open a channel to Nigh=
tshift, but then remembered
> that he was in a communications black out, "A=
lso I am worried about
> Nightshift. The Predacons are not idiots. I wish w=
e had spent more
> time thinking this plan through. Just trapsing into the =
predacon
> headquarters with only the predacon spark signature was probably=
 not
> the best plan." Elder tapped his fingers on the console in
> frustra=
tion, "I wish we knew what was going on!"
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>
